laboratory_examinations.findings: Heterogeneous echotexture seen in the liver; a fibrous cord noted replacing the middle hepatic vein; presence of mild ascites.
No color flow noted in hepatic veins.

No contrast opacification in middle and left hepatic veins; partial opacification in right hepatic vein; complete thrombosis of middle and left hepatic veins; partial thrombosis of right hepatic vein; slit-like visualization of the hepatic part of IVC; slight enlargement of the caudate lobe; heterogeneous mottled appearance of the liver (nutmeg liver).
